formula: a(n) = 2*sum(k=1..n, sum(j=0..(n-k)/2, C(n,n-k-2*j)*(k^(n-k-2*j) *sum(i=0..k/2, (2*i-k)^(k+2*j)*C(k,i)*(-1)^(k+j-i))))/(2^k*k)). - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Jun 13 2011a(n) ~ (-1)^(n+1) * (n-1)! / r^n, where r = 0.588532743981861... is the real root of the equation sin(r) = exp(-r). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 25 2013
author: _R. H. Hardin_
